alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 9:59AM CDT until July 14 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Frontier County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 1045 AM CDT. * At 959 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Wellfleet, or 11 miles west of Curtis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Curtis, Moorefield, Stockville, Maywood, Quick, Freedom and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 32 and 51. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
